content: Hey Chad, thanks for this. As a freelancer chaos can reign and sometimes it’s tough to find calmness and focus in it all. This playlist has been killer for me. It’s called the “most relaxing songs in the world” and they have been scientifically studied to focus and calm the mind: https://open.spotify.com/user/1286544262@/playlist/31lxxIDyC3qYrtH6TpGFwxZach
